test-set.name: si-apply-templates
test-set.description: Tests xsl:stream instruction introduced in XSLT 3.0 with xsl:apply-templates.

test-case.name: si-apply-templates-001
test-case.description: Test of xsl:stream instruction with xsl:apply-templates, navigating to attributes and ancestors. From a Saxon bug report by Roger Costello.

all-of.assert: /Results/CATEGORIES/CATEGORY[1]/Attributes[Name='CODE' and Value='P' and Name='DESC' and Value='Paperback']

/Results/CATEGORIES/CATEGORY[1]/Ancestors[ *[1][self::Name][.='BOOKLIST'] and *[2][self::Attributes[not(*)]] and *[3][self::Name][.='CATEGORIES'] and *[4][self::Attributes[Name='DESC' and Value='Miscellaneous categories']]]

test-case.name: si-apply-templates-002
test-case.description: Test of xsl:stream instruction with xsl:apply-templates, itself appearing within a streamable template. From a Saxon bug report by Roger Costello.

all-of.assert: /Results/CATEGORIES/CATEGORY[1]/Attributes[Name='CODE' and Value='P' and Name='DESC' and Value='Paperback']

/Results/CATEGORIES/CATEGORY[1]/Ancestors[ *[1][self::Name][.='BOOKLIST'] and *[2][self::Attributes[not(*)]] and *[3][self::Name][.='CATEGORIES'] and *[4][self::Attributes[Name='DESC' and Value='Miscellaneous categories']]]
